<rule id="springboot-scheduled-to-quarkus-00000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <javaclass references="org.springframework.scheduling.annotation.Scheduled">
                    <location>ANNOTATION</location>
                </javaclass>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the SpringBoot context artifact with Quarkus 'spring-scheduled' extension">
                    <message>
                        Replace the Spring Context artifact with Quarkus `spring-scheduled` extension

                        Spring Scheduled is in spring-context artifact brought transitively by any `org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-*` dependency
                        Add Quarkus dependency `io.quarkus:quarkus-spring-scheduled`
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/spring-scheduled" title="Quarkus Spring Scheduled Guide"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
